titles.title: A bill to provide for the award of medals or other commendations to handlers of military working dogs and military working dogs, and for other purposes.
Guardians of America's Freedom Medal Act
Guardians of America's Freedom Medal Act
Guardians of America's Freedom Medal Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires each military department to carry out a program to award medals or other commendations to military working dogs and their handlers to recognize valor or meritorious achievement.
